events.message: I recently purchased a pair of shoes, but they do not fit well and I would like to request a refund for the order as soon as possible.
The customer has requested to return the product and get a refund due to sizing issues with the shoes they purchased.
Assigned customer support agent Jane M. to handle refund request case regarding shoe order number 485732.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the shoes you ordered.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the refund so I can check the details and proceed accordingly?
The order number is 485732. The shoes are too small despite following the sizing chart, so I definitely want a full refund.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process. Please return the shoes within 14 days using the prepaid shipping label we will send you.
Thanks for the quick response and the clear instructions. I will send the shoes back by tomorrow.
We have received your returned shoes and processed the refund. The amount should reflect on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
Your refund case has been successfully closed. Thank you for shopping with us and we hope to serve you again in the future.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email to gather feedback on your refund experience and improve our service.
